_sText:
Hey guys! First of all, this is my first surfing map I made so be gentle (^^').


<fieldset><legend>Surf_freedom_v8:</legend>
- Game: Counter Strike: Source

- Sub-mod: Surf

- Players: 32v32 (max. 64)

- Info: Basic textures with freshing lighting and pleasent challenges.

- Tips: Secret buttons, secret buyzone and room, locked powerfull weapons in each zone (Pro and Noob), etc.
</fieldset>

<fieldset><legend>Screenshots:</legend>
- Number of screenshots: 6

- Screenshot A: Phase 1

- Screenshot B: Spawns and Top

- Screenshot C: Phase 2

- Screenshot D: Pro zone

- Screenshot E: Noob zone

- Screenshot F: Jail Top (only for Pro zone) and Jail Down (for jaileds and around for Noob zone)
</fieldset>

Well we sure hope you find this map good to play on and hopefully with good feedback we will continue mapping for surf.

Cheers, 
Biohazard.pt (Map author) and Volk.pt (suggestions guy ^^)
